Properties.ProtectedString:
--Stickamsterluke --this script this made so that the sound is not played locally
sp=script.Parent
local s=Instance.new("Sound") s.Volume=2 s.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=75992638" s.Looped=false s.PlayOnRemove=false s.Parent=sp wait() s:Play()

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
local weaponevent=sp:WaitForChild("WeaponEvent")
firerate=.25
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse~=nil then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() weaponevent:FireServer("Fire",mouse.Hit.p) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(firerate) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end) end end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
local weaponevent=sp:WaitForChild("WeaponEvent")
damage=22 firerate=.25 range=200 barreloffset=Vector3.new(0,1.9,.3)
blackholeduration=3.5 force=3000 eventhorizon=2 effectradius=20
rate=1/30 debris=game:GetService("Debris") lastblackhole=0 equipped=false check=true
function tagHumanoid(humanoid) for _,v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v and v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local creator_tag=Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value=lastplr creator_tag.Name="creator" debris:AddItem(creator,3) creator_tag.Parent=humanoid end
function checkintangible(hit) if hit and hit~=nil then if hit:IsDescendantOf(sp.Parent) or hit.Transparency>.8 or string.lower(string.sub(hit.Name,1,6))=="effect" or hit.Name=="Handle" or hit.Name=="Bullet" or hit.Name=="Laser" or string.lower(hit.Name)=="water" then return true end end return false end
function castray(startpos,vec,length,ignore,delayifhit) hit,endpos2=game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(startpos,vec*length),ignore) if hit~=nil then if checkintangible(hit) then if delayifhit then wait() end hit,endpos2=castray(endpos2+(vec*.01),vec,length-((startpos-endpos2).magnitude),ignore,delayifhit) end end return hit,endpos2 end
function recursive(item,cntrpos) if item~=nil and item.Parent~=nil then if item:IsA("BasePart") then if not item.Anchored and item:FindFirstChild("BlackHoleForce")==nil then if (item.Position-cntrpos).magnitude<effectradius then local bp=Instance.new("BodyPosition") bp.Name="BlackHoleForce" bp.position=cntrpos local massforce=item:GetMass()*force bp.maxForce=Vector3.new(massforce,massforce,massforce) bp.D=massforce*0 bp.P=massforce*.05 debris:AddItem(bp,.99) bp.Parent=item end end end for i,v in ipairs(item:GetChildren()) do recursive(v,cntrpos) end end end
function makeblackhole(centerpos) if tick()-lastblackhole>=blackholeduration then lastblackhole=tick() local singularity=Instance.new("Part") singularity.Shape="Ball" singularity.Size=Vector3.new(1,1,1)--Vector3.new(eventhorizon*2,eventhorizon*2,eventhorizon*2) singularity.CanCollide=false singularity.Anchored=true singularity.Transparency=1 singularity.Name="Singularity" singularity.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Really black") singularity.CFrame=CFrame.new(centerpos)
local bhgui=sp.BillboardGui:clone() bhgui.Size=UDim2.new(0,0,0,0) bhgui.ImageLabel.Visible=true bhgui.Parent=singularity
local bsound=sp.Handle.SoundScript:clone() bsound.Parent=singularity bsound.Disabled=false
singularity.Touched:connect(function(deadpart) if deadpart~=nil and deadpart.Parent~=nil then if not deadpart.Anchored then local h=deadpart.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h then tagHumanoid(h) end deadpart:remove() end end end) debris:AddItem(singularity,blackholeduration+3) singularity.Parent=game.Workspace
bframes=1/rate for bframe=1,bframes do local bpercent=bframe/bframes bhgui.Size=UDim2.new(bpercent*eventhorizon*2,0,bpercent*eventhorizon*2,0) wait(rate) end
for iw=1,blackholeduration/.25 do recursive(game.Workspace,centerpos) wait(.25) end
bframes=.5/rate for bframe=1,bframes do local bpercent=1-(bframe/bframes) bhgui.Size=UDim2.new(bpercent*eventhorizon*2,0,bpercent*eventhorizon*2,0) wait(rate) end end end
function drawbeam(beamstart,beamend,clr,fadedelay) local dist=(beamstart-beamend).magnitude local laser=Instance.new("Part") laser.Name="Laser" laser.Anchored=true laser.CanCollide=false laser.Shape="Block" laser.formFactor="Custom" laser.Size=Vector3.new(.2,.2,.2) laser.Transparency=0 laser.Material=Enum.Material.Plastic laser.Locked=true laser.TopSurface=0 laser.BottomSurface=0 laser.BrickColor=clr laser.CFrame=CFrame.new(beamend,beamstart)*CFrame.new(0,0,-dist/2)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,dist*5,1) m.Parent=laser debris:AddItem(laser,fadedelay*3) laser.Parent=game.Workspace wait(.25) local frames=fadedelay/rate for frame=1,frames do wait(rate) local percent=frame/frames m.Scale=Vector3.new(1+(20*percent),dist*5,1+(20*percent)) laser.Transparency=.5+(percent*.5) end wait(2) laser:remove() end
function fire(target) local he=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Head") local hu=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if check and he and hu and hu.Health>0 then check=false local startpos=he.Position local vec=(target-startpos).unit local hit,endpos=castray(startpos,vec,range,sp.Parent,false) sp.Handle.Sound:Play() if hit and hit~=nil then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil and h.Health>0 then if h.Health<=damage then --Fun unique weapon effect time! :D delay(0,function() makeblackhole(endpos) end) end tagHumanoid(h) h:TakeDamage(damage) end end delay(0,function() --This is nessecery to fire multible shots at the same time. For those who don't know, delay() is a poor man's coroutine. drawbeam((sp.Handle.CFrame*CFrame.new(barreloffset)).p,endpos,BrickColor.new("Really black"),.5) end) wait(firerate) check=true end end
weaponevent.OnServerEvent:connect(function(plr,...) if plr then local tuple={...} if tuple[1]=="Fire" then if plr and tuple[2] then lastplr=plr fire(tuple[2]) end end end end)
